quote.phrase: “Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.”
"Shit disregards religion, race and beliefs. Yet, shit happens."
"The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well."
"The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well."
"I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... that is my ninja way!"
"I dont know, I dont care, I just wanna do my hair"
"Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work."
